segments.text: Peter , do you want to learn to play the piano ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , mom . Piano is for girls .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , there are many boys that can play the piano very well , like Jay Chou .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No way , mom . I don't like piano .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . But you have to promise me that you will study hard in your English class .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right , all right . I understand .
segments.speaker: S2
